responses: Hi there, how can I help?
Ask me how to make prediction.
Ask me about what plants we currently support
Ask me about diseases we support?

patterns: what are the steps involved to make predictions
Give me a list of steps involved to make predictions
List all steps involved to make prediction
Which steps are involved to make predictions?
responses:
Steps for predictions:
  1. Login using otp.
  2. Take the photo of infected leaf.
  3. Choose captured image.
  4. Click on predict.

patterns: I'm facing problem with your website
I would like to speak to customer service
I would like to speak to customer care
predictions are not working for my image
responses:
Please contact us using our support page,
Our Team will get in touch with you.

patterns: I want to know which plants I can predict
can you show me plant's list
responses:
Our system can detect crop leaf diseases for following plants:
  1. Apple
  2. Corn
  3. Grape
  4. Pepper Bell
  5. Potato
  6. Rice
  7. Tomato
  8. Wheat

patterns: can you tell me diseases list
responses:
Our system can detect following diseases:
  1. Apple scab
  2. Apple Black rot
  3. Apple Cedar apple rust
  4. Apple healthy
  5. Corn Cercospora leaf spot
  6. Corn Common rust
  7. Corn healthy
  8. Corn Northern Leaf Blight
  9. Grape Black_rot
  10. Grape Esca
  11. Grape healthy
  12. Grape Leaf blight
  13. Pepper bell Bacterial_spot
  14. Pepper bell healthy
  15. Potato Early blight
  16. Potato healthy
  17. Potato Late blight
  18. Rice Bacterial leaf blight
  19. Rice Leaf smut
  20. RiceBrown spot
  21. Tomato Bacterial spot
  22. Tomato Early blight
  23. Tomato healthy
  24. Tomato Late blight
  25. Tomato Leaf Mold
  26. Tomato Septoria leaf spot
  27. Tomato Spider mites Two spotted spider mite
  28. Tomato Target_Spot
  29. Tomato Tomato mosaic virus
  30. Tomato Tomato Yellow Leaf Curl Virus
  31. Wheat Healthy
  32. Wheat septoria
  33. Wheat stripe rust
We are extreamly sorry for this please click Here for predictions.
